code: @Bean @ConditionalOnMissingBean public RestTemplateBuilder restTemplateBuilder(ObjectProvider<HttpMessageConverters> messageConverters, ObjectProvider<RestTemplateCustomizer> restTemplateCustomizers) {     RestTemplateBuilder builder = new RestTemplateBuilder().     HttpMessageConverters converters = messageConverters.getIfUnique().     if (converters != null) {         builder = builder.messageConverters(converters.getConverters()).     }     List<RestTemplateCustomizer> customizers = restTemplateCustomizers.orderedStream().collect(Collectors.toList()).     if (!customizers.isEmpty()) {         builder = builder.customizers(customizers).     }     return builder. }
